amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 211. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to purchase, acquire, install, or use any medium screw base compact fluorescent lamp or light bulb.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 112-173 to prohibit use of funds to purchase, acquire, install, or use any medium screw base compact fluorescent lamp or light bulb (CFL).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 283 (Roll no. 626).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Thompson (PA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 283 (Roll no. 626).
